text: wma znn hwla' aladhin ytkhrswn ealaa allah alkadhib yawm alhsab, fydyfwn 'iilayh tahrim ma lam yhrmh ealayhim min alarzaq walaqwat, 'ana allah faeil bihim yawm alqiamat bkdhbhm wfiryatihm elyh? 'ayahsabun 'anah ysfh eanhum wayaghfir lhm? 'iina allah ladhu fadl ealaa khlqh; btrkh meajlt man aftra ealayh alkadhib baleqwbt fi aldunya w'imhalh 'iyah, wlkn 'akthar alnaas la yashkurun allah ealaa tfdlh ealayhim bdhlk
